revision.text:
<!--호수_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Lake
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 호수_이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영어_이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지방 | ontologyProperty = region }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 도시 | ontologyProperty = city }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 섬 | ontologyProperty = island }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 위치 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{GeocoordinatesMapping | coordinates = 좌표 }}
	{{GeocoordinatesMapping | latitudeDegrees = 위도도  | latitudeMinutes = 위도분  | latitudeSeconds = 위도초  | latitudeDirection = 남북  | longitudeDegrees = 경도도  | longitudeMinutes = 경도분  | longitudeSeconds = 경도초  | longitudeDirection = 동서 }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 호수_유형 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 유입 | ontologyProperty = inflow }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 유출 | ontologyProperty = outflow }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 평균_고도 | ontologyProperty = elevation | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 유역_면적 | ontologyProperty = areaOfCatchment | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 최대_길이 | ontologyProperty = length | unit = kilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 최대_너비 | ontologyProperty = width | unit = kilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 표면_면적 | ontologyProperty = areaTotal | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 평균_수심 | ontologyProperty = depth | unit = metre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수량 | ontologyProperty = volume | unit = cubicMetre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 호수_둘레 | ontologyProperty = shoreLength | unit = kilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 결빙_이력 | ontologyProperty = frozen }}
end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|구역 = 
|최대_고도 = 
|최소_고도 = 
|최소_수심 = 
|체류_기간 = 
-->
